name: Sir Stretchalot
description:
Put on the helmet and become more than a man. Become Sir Stretchalot, a Stretcher who travels the land, saving the day and stretching hotties, whether they be Monster Girls, regular girls, or anything in between.


Sir Stretchalot is an episodic experience that includes cut-scenes and a simple JRPG combat system that players will find easy to understand and use. There is some dungeon crawling, and the game is very narrative heavy and contains over 5k words of dialogue.

New episodes will be added regularly.
